item.title: The photogrid got a new update! It's more mobile-friendly an…
item.description: The photogrid got a new update! It's more mobile-friendly and has swipe support now. ALSO my guide: How to play Drakengard 3 is up and available to read!

item.title: I'm updating and reorganizing the media logs. First up: vide…
item.description: I'm updating and reorganizing the media logs. First up: video games, now redesigned and relocated: /notebook/videogames. Now featuring thumbnails and filterable by status, platform, and rating!

item.title: Created an RSS feed for site updates. /updates/feed/xml. Add…
item.description: Created an RSS feed for site updates. /updates/feed/xml. Added new links in /notebook/bookmarks. Joined 2 new webrings. Shrines page and Drakengard 3 shrine is finally up!!!

item.title: Theme updates and tweaks. New photos in the photogrid! Worki…

item.title: Switched from CSS grid to flexbox on every page for more acc…
item.description: Switched from CSS grid to flexbox on every page for more accessibility. Every page should be perfectly responsive now. Also added a "like" button to my blog posts!

item.title: Improved photogrid with modals and ability to click through …
item.description: Improved photogrid with modals and ability to click through gallery with keyboard. Added Miku theme in honor of last weekend.
